notifiers.console.name: Console Notifier
notifiers.console.description: Displays posture alerts in the console. Useful for debugging.

notifiers.sound.name: Sound Notifier
notifiers.sound.description: Plays a noise when your posture is bad.

file.name: File
file.description: File to play when posture is bad.

notifiers.webcall.name: Web Call Notifier
notifiers.webcall.description: Sends a request to a web endpoint when your posture is bad.

url.name: URL
url.description: URL to send GET request to.
